snippet.title: Curse of the Arrow trailer
snippet.description:
The game release is on 30th January 2018. 


Buy it here: https://egordorichev.itch.io/curse-of-the-arrow


Explore worlds, solve puzzles, and fight against the curse that was imposed on you by an ancient statue!

Your only weapon is a bow and a single arrow to defend yourself against your own corruption!

Use your arrows as platforms, fight against enemies, toggle some switches, and push boxes!

* 5 chapters with 100 levels!
* Features an original soundtrack by Failpositive, and lots of SFX!
* Key remapping... oh boy!
* Various difficulty levels!
* Solving puzzles and fighting enemies, at the same time!
* Joystick support!

Support the devs!

Game page: https://egordorichev.itch.io/curse-of-the-arrow
Developers: https://twitter.com/egordorichev,  https://twitter.com/Failpositive
